definitions.text: people without possessions or wealth (considered as a group)

examples: the shabby room struck her as extraordinarily pathetic

definitions.text: having little money or few possessions
examples: deplored the gap between rich and poor countries
the proverbial poor artist living in a garret
the country had a poor economy
they lived in the poor section of town

definitions.text: lacking in specific resources, qualities or substances
examples: the area was poor in timber and coal

definitions.text: not sufficient to meet a need
